name: Turtle Dance
description:
I'm making this kind of experimental game so everyone can become a dance animator without needing any more skills than moving your finger (or mouse).

Instructions:

- Tap many times over the Metronome to get the speed (tempo) of any external music the app will calculate the BPM(beats per minute).

- Drag body parts of the character to animate it in real-time.  After count reach 4 beats, any movement will playback and repeat every 4 beats. 

- If you don't understand my explanation just play around with it, you'll figure it out, as always :D 

Development:
 Just another idea I wanted to implement, intended to play with a phone using your finger touches. If you like it, let me know!
